## An App to Map Goals.

The user supplies a personality assesment, and allows them in an app to set SMART based goals. Using text mining from advice threads, prior users, MORE EXAMPLES HERE, the app creates a series of high probability touch points suggesting ways the user can start now to accomplish these goals in a given time frame. The user can then turn on or off different touchpoints and see a probability estimate of how likely they will be able to achieve their goal without those touchpoints.
